drawer.title: Personal Data Collection and Use Agreement
drawer.description: Please review the personal data collection and use agreement.

privacy.title: Personal Data Collection Agreement (Required)
privacy.purposeText: Providing work style diagnostic services and statistical analysis
privacy.itemsText: Name, gender, age range, test responses (all items optional)
privacy.processingText: Anonymized and used only for statistical purposes
privacy.notice: * Personal information is stored encrypted and used only for service improvement and statistical analysis.

validation.consentRequired: Please agree to personal data collection and use.

sections.heartPrescriptionDescription: Check your mental health in 3 minutes

footer.disclaimer1: This result analyzes your work tendencies.
footer.disclaimer2: Please answer honestly for more accurate results.

AB.combo1: Action Leader (You) + Advisor = 120% increase in strategic execution
AB.combo2: Action Leader + Peacemaker = 75% reduction in team conflicts
AB.teamRatio: Recommended team composition: Action Leader 30% + Social King 20% + Advisor 30% + Peacemaker 20%

AA.name: Social King who shines in relationships
AA.description: Active and warm personality that values relationships with people
AA.needs: Others' attention and favor, and praise
negativeTraits: Gets sulky easily when hurt feelings accumulate
Confronts surroundings in an emotional way
Invests too much time in external activities
Thinks others are lecturing when they explain logically

AB.name: Progressive and confident Action Leader
AB.description: Leadership type with active yet logical thinking
AB.needs: Others' recognition and respect, and authority
negativeTraits: Actively rebels against company or supervisor policies
Reports to higher organizations immediately when dissatisfied

BA.name: Caring and warm Peacemaker
BA.description: Careful yet considerate and detailed personality
BA.needs: Others' support and confidence, and peace
negativeTraits: Becomes indecisive and avoids when decisions need to be made
Shows passive attitude and excessive dependence
Causes irritation among colleagues due to lack of confidence

BB.name: Trustworthy and honest Advisor
BB.description: Type that makes accurate judgments with careful and logical thinking
BB.needs: Trust relationships with others and fairness, and principles
negativeTraits: Gets angry when someone receives special treatment or fairness is violated
Doesn't tolerate even small mistakes from those who lost trust
Emphasizes negative aspects of new tasks and is cynical
Gets indignant about unfairness and points it out sharply
